<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ravening's Desperation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1213) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 67</row>

**Prerequisites**
trained in [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82) [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

Your study of the [Beast of Gluttondark](/Deities.aspx?ID=82) has taught you how to make do in the most trying of circumstances rather than succumb to weakness. As long as your current Hit Points are less than half your maximum Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks. If your current Hit Points are less than a quarter your maximum Hit Points, the circumstance bonus is +2 instead.
